item.title: 印孚瑟斯上调销售预期，科技支出复苏迹象显现
item.description: 印孚瑟斯公司上调了年度销售预测，表明企业信息技术支出持续低迷的态势正开始缓解。【原文：Infosys Ltd. raised its annual sales forecast, signaling that a protracted slump in corporate information technology spending is starting to ease.】

item.title: 第六街为欧洲直接贷款业务筹集37.5亿欧元
item.description: 第六街已从投资者处筹集37.5亿欧元（44亿美元），旨在把握欧洲直接贷款市场的融资机遇。【原文：Sixth Street has raised €3.75 billion ($4.4 billion) from investors to target financing opportunities in Europe’s direct lending market.】

item.title: 华尔街担忧政策不确定性，中期选举临近
item.description: 华尔街最热衷的莫过于用精妙的缩写词来概括交易理念。想想FANG、FOMO/YOLO和TACO这些词就知道了。【原文：Wall Street loves few things more than a good acronym to describe a trading thesis. Think FANG, FOMO/YOLO and TACO.】

item.title: 银行对特朗普削弱种族歧视性贷款规则的计划保持沉默
item.description: 美国大型银行对特朗普政府官员最新试图撤销反种族歧视贷款保护措施的行动保持沉默，这与2020年形成鲜明对比——当时富国银行、美国银行、摩根大通和花旗集团的高管曾联名请愿政府维持类似保障措施。【原文：Big US banks have gone quiet on Trump administration officials’ latest attempt to roll back protections against racist lending practices, a reversal from 2020 when executives from Wells Fargo & Co., Bank of America Corp., JPMorgan Chase & Co. and Citigroup Inc. petitioned the government to leave similar safeguards in place.】

item.title: Polymarket涉足法律灰色地带，为战争交易提供平台
item.description: 尽管预测市场平台对法律和监管规范的挑战已达到前所未有的程度，但大多数平台仍对一类交易划定了界限：直接押注战争。【原文：Even as prediction-market platforms have tested legal and regulatory norms like never before, most have drawn a line at one category: direct wagers on war.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴和摩根大通据称投资芯片设计公司Montage在香港上市
item.description: 知情人士透露，中国芯片设计公司蒙特吉科技即将在香港上市，阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司和摩根大通资产管理公司将成为其主要投资者。这表明亚洲金融中心最新的人工智能相关股票发行需求前景看好。【原文：Chinese chip designer Montage Technology Co. is set to enlist Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. and JPMorgan Asset Management among the key investors in its upcoming Hong Kong listing, according to people familiar with the matter, in a sign of promising demand for the Asian financial hub’s latest share sale related to artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 安哥拉将与摩根大通的10亿美元贷款协议延长三年
item.description: 据财政部消息，安哥拉与摩根大通公司达成协议，将10亿美元贷款展期，并从这家美国金融机构获得了额外5亿美元融资。【原文：Angola agreed with JPMorgan Chase & Co. to rollover a $1 billion loan and secured an extra $500 million in financing from the US lender, according to the finance ministry.】

item.title: 土耳其通胀压力催生二手食品连锁店兴起
item.description: 土耳其生活成本危机催生了该国首家廉价食品连锁店，因多年高通胀而陷入困境的消费者正四处寻找更便宜的食品。【原文：Turkey’s cost-of-living crisis has given rise to the country’s first salvage grocery chain, as shoppers squeezed by years of high inflation hunt for cheaper food.】

item.title: Jollibee计划借助深厚的美国投资者基础拓展海外业务
item.description: 菲律宾快餐集团Jollibee Foods Corp.计划在美国上市，以期利用该国庞大的投资者群体，这为公司提供了比疲软的本土市场更多的机遇。【原文：Philippine fast-food group Jollibee Foods Corp. plans a US listing in order to tap into the nation’s deep investor base that offers the company more opportunities than its anemic home market.】

item.title: 阿斯托格公司筹备出售IQ-EQ资产，贷款方正筹措20亿欧元收购债务
item.description: 私募股权公司Astorg正准备启动其基金服务业务IQ-EQ的出售程序，贷款方已为潜在竞标者准备了约20亿欧元（23亿美元）的债务融资。【原文：Private equity firm Astorg is getting ready to kick off a sale of its fund services business IQ-EQ, with lenders preparing debt financing of about €2 billion ($2.3 billion) for potential bidders.】

item.title: 据称本菲卡与摩根大通就里斯本体育场翻新事宜展开磋商
item.description: 据知情人士透露，葡萄牙足球俱乐部本菲卡正就筹资计划与包括摩根大通公司在内的多家银行进行接洽，该计划旨在翻新其位于里斯本的主场并开发周边区域。【原文：Portuguese football club Benfica is sounding out banks including JPMorgan Chase & Co. on a plan to raise funds to renovate its Lisbon stadium and develop the surrounding area, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 贸易与战争忧虑笼罩达沃斯，世界被视为"悬崖边缘"
item.description: 世界经济论坛一项调查显示，受访者认为2026年的全球局势将呈现贸易争端与国家间冲突日益加剧的态势。【原文：A global backdrop increasingly threatened by trade disputes and inter-state conflict is how respondents in a World Economic Forum survey see things panning out in 2026.】

item.title: 据称百度正考虑将香港上市地位提升为主要上市地位
item.description: 知情人士透露，百度公司正考虑将其香港上市地位升级为主要上市地位，以获得更多中国内地投资者的关注，并保护自己免受美国潜在不利政策的影响。【原文：Baidu Inc. is considering upgrading its Hong Kong listing to primary status to gain more exposure to investors in mainland China and protect itself from potentially unfavorable US policies, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 刚果将向美国提供矿产项目清单以推进协议
item.description: 刚果民主共和国将于近期向美国提交一份矿产项目清单，供美国投资者考虑开发。此前六周，两国刚刚签署了战略伙伴关系协议。【原文：The Democratic Republic of Congo will shortly share a list of minerals projects with the US for possible development by American investors, six weeks after the two nations signed a strategic partnership.】

item.title: 意大利梅洛尼将第五次任命埃尼集团资深首席执行官
item.description: 意大利政府正准备再次任命克劳迪奥·德斯卡尔齐为意大利国有能源企业埃尼集团首席执行官，此举将延长这位欧洲任职时间最长的石油公司高管之一的任期，并体现出管理层的延续性。【原文：Italy’s government is preparing to reconfirm Claudio Descalzi as chief executive officer of Italian state-backed energy firm Eni SpA, a move that would extend the term of one of Europe’s longest-serving oil chiefs and project continuity.】

item.title: 交易员准备迎接"唐罗理论"推动2026年市场波动
item.description: 投资者正为地缘政治风险加剧的一年做准备，因为白宫正推行"唐罗伊主义"——这项特朗普式复兴的200年历史外交政策旨在彰显美国在西半球乃至更广范围的主导地位。【原文：Investors are bracing for a year of heightened geopolitical risk as the White House leans into the “Donroe Doctrine,” the Trumpian revival of a 200-year-old foreign policy that aims to project American dominance in the Western Hemisphere and possibly beyond.】

item.title: 南非盛赞美南非贸易协定利好，参议院投票在即
item.description: 南非政府对美国参议院在关键投票前批准一项优惠贸易协定表示欢迎。此前，南非政府在参议院面临反对意见，这些反对意见质疑南非是否应继续保留在该协定中的地位。【原文：South Africa’s government welcomed the approval of a US preferential-trade deal before a key vote in the Senate, where Pretoria has faced opposition to its continued inclusion in the pact.】

item.title: 日元创18个月新低后 日本警告外汇投机者
item.description: 日本财务大臣在日元兑美元汇率跌至18个月低点之际，针对投机者发出新一轮警告。此前有报道称日本将举行提前大选。【原文：Japan’s finance minister issued a fresh warning to speculators after the yen weakened to its lowest level against the dollar in 18 months amid reports of a snap general election.】

item.title: 汇丰银行计划将20亿欧元企业贷款相关风险进行转移
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司正评估投资者对一项重大风险转移的兴趣，该交易涉及约20亿欧元（23亿美元）投资级企业贷款组合。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc is gauging investor demand for a significant risk transfer tied to a portfolio of about €2 billion ($2.3 billion) of investment-grade corporate loans.】

item.title: 英国央行决策者称特朗普关税正降低英国通胀率
item.description: 英格兰银行利率制定者艾伦·泰勒表示，存在"显著贸易分化"的迹象，这正在降低英国通胀率。他预测利率将早于预期回落至中性水平。【原文：Bank of England rate-setter Alan Taylor said there are signs of “substantial trade divergence” that is lowering UK inflation, as he predicted interest rates will fall to neutral levels sooner rather than later.】

item.title: 中国称正调查携程涉嫌反垄断行为
item.description: 据国家市场监督管理总局消息，中国正就涉嫌反垄断行为对国内最大在线旅行社携程集团有限公司展开调查。【原文：China is investigating Trip.com Group Ltd., the country’s largest online travel agency, over alleged antitrust conduct, according to the State Administration for Market Regulation.】

item.title: 丰田工业收购要约在投资者反对后提高报价
item.description: 丰田工业公司的收购要约已提高，此前投资者批评该报价可能加强创始家族对日本最大企业集团的控制权。【原文：The buyout offer for Toyota Industries Corp. has been raised following investor criticism of a bid that could strengthen the founding family’s control over the country’s largest business group.】

item.title: 报告称台湾富豪财富年增长率达10%
item.description: 台湾最富裕家庭的财富将在2029年前以每年约10%的速度增长，全球科技竞赛正推动市场发展，并为岛内尖端企业创造丰厚收益。【原文：Taiwan’s richest households will see their wealth grow about 10% a year through 2029 as a global technology race lifts markets and stokes income for the island’s cutting-edge companies.】

item.title: 法国国债发售将考验市场需求，财政预算风险逼近"危险区"
item.description: 鉴于法国议员尚未就今年预算达成一致，且该国赤字正面临央行行长所称的"危险区域"风险，法国最新国债发售将成为投资者信心的一场考验。【原文：France’s latest bond sale will be a test of investor faith in the country, given lawmakers have yet to agree a budget for this year and its deficit is risking what the central bank’s chief calls a “danger zone.”】

item.title: 中东能源基金计划推进私募股权投资以推动交易浪潮
item.description: 中东地区历史最悠久的国家支持型投资机构之一正进一步进军私募股权领域，寻求新的能源交易机会。【原文：One of the Middle East’s oldest state-backed investors is pushing further into private equity in search of new energy deals.】

item.title: 英国Vistry集团2025年住宅销售额下滑9%，预算不确定性加剧
item.description: 维斯特里集团2025年房屋销售量下降9%，因英国预算引发的不确定性导致下半年市场陷入低迷。【原文：Vistry Group Plc sold 9% fewer homes in 2025 after uncertainty driven by the UK budget created a “subdued market” in the second half of the year.】

item.title: 沙特公司Jadwa转向私人信贷以推动新交易势头
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯公司Jadwa Investment Co.正为其旗舰私募信贷基金筹集高达2亿美元资金，试图借此把握海湾地区因替代融资需求激增而涌现的大量新交易机遇。【原文：Saudi Arabian firm Jadwa Investment Co. is seeking to raise as much as $200 million for its flagship private credit fund as it attempts to tap into a rush of new deals arising from the need for alternative financing in the Gulf.】

item.title: 特斯拉全自动驾驶系统将转为订阅制，马斯克宣布
item.description: 特斯拉公司将停止销售其称为"完全自动驾驶"的高级驾驶辅助系统，转而采用完全基于月度订阅的服务模式。【原文：Tesla Inc. will stop selling the advanced driver-assistance system it calls Full Self-Driving, and instead switch to an entirely monthly subscription service.】

item.title: 乌克兰关键军火供应商CSG计划在阿姆斯特丹上市
item.description: 装甲车和军火制造商捷克集团宣布计划在阿姆斯特丹上市，这可能成为有史以来规模最大的国防类首次公开募股。【原文：Armored vehicle and munitions maker Czechoslovak Group announced plans to go public in Amsterdam, in what could be the largest-ever defense initial public offering.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚通胀率逼近10%，为动荡政治年画上句号
item.description: 罗马尼亚通胀率仍维持在央行目标区间上限的三倍左右，此前政府为控制预算赤字采取的措施助推了价格上涨。【原文：Romanian inflation remained at nearly three times the upper band of the central bank’s target range after government action to curb the budget deficit helped fuel price growth.】
